spec_data.Name: rubygem-rmail
spec_data.Description:
RMail is a lightweight mail library containing various utility classes and
modules that allow ruby scripts to parse, modify, and generate MIME mail
messages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Feb 2017 10:35:06 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A MIME mail parsing and generation library
